mapper.select: SELECT t1.berth_mark as berthNum, CONCAT_WS(',', t1.longitude, t1.latitude) AS startLocation, CONCAT_WS(',', t2.longitude, t2.latitude) AS endLocation, ROUND(ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(POINT(t1.longitude, t1.latitude), POINT(t2.longitude, t2.latitude)), 2) AS length FROM patrol_berth_collect_record t1 INNER JOIN patrol_berth_collect_record t2 ON t1.berth_mark = t2.berth_mark WHERE t1.task_mark = #{taskId} and t2.task_mark = #{taskId} and t1.part_mark = 0 AND t2.part_mark = 1;

select *, ST_Distance_Sphere(ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', SUBSTRING_INDEX(start_location, ',', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(start_location, ',', -1), ')')), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude})) as start_dist, ST_Distance_Sphere(ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', SUBSTRING_INDEX(end_location, ',', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(end_location, ',', -1), ')')), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude})) as end_dist from patrol_berth order by LEAST(start_dist, end_dist) limit 1

select *, ST_Distance_Sphere(ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', SUBSTRING_INDEX(start_location, ',', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(start_location, ',', -1), ')')), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude})) as start_dist, ST_Distance_Sphere(ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', SUBSTRING_INDEX(end_location, ',', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(end_location, ',', -1), ')')), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude})) as end_dist from patrol_berth order by LEAST(start_dist, end_dist) limit #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into patrol_berth (id, berth_num, berth_num_virtual, start_location, end_location, length, start_point, end_point) values (#{berth.id}, #{berth.berthNum}, #{berth.berthNumVirtual}, #{berth.startLocation}, #{berth.endLocation}, #{berth.length}, ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{berth.startLocation}, ',', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{berth.startLocation}, ',', -1), ')')), ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{berth.endLocation}, ',', 1), ' ', SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{berth.endLocation}, ',', -1), ')')) )
